verse: पुञ्जीभूतं प्रेम गोपाङ्गनानां मूर्तीभूतं भागधेयं यदूनाम् । एकीभूतं गुप्तवित्तं श्रुतीनां श्यामीभूतं ब्रह्म मे सन्निधत्ताम् ॥
overall_meaning: May the clustered love of the cowherd girls, the incarnation and object of affection of the Yadus, singular and secret treasure of the scriptures, dark-complexioned Supreme Reality, be present near me.
